responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "1D87F5A94850B6128CECBCA03D3E8AAF", "Essence Wells are highly complex structures that employ applied magic designs to tap into  essence ley lines. There are four known arcane ley lines, Earth, Water, Air, and Fire. An Essence Well will siphon residual magic to create a reservoir of arcane power.  The Essence Wells must be contructed near their elemental source. Once functioning, a well can be siphoned using an Arcane Rod, or in some cases a Foci, which allows access to all forms at once. ")
name: MIDD_0015_BFP_ClockworkCodex_15
